titles.title: Crooked River Ranch Fire Protection Act
Crooked River Ranch Fire Protection Act
Crooked River Ranch Fire Protection Act
Crooked River Ranch Fire Protection Act

To adjust the eastern boundary of the Deschutes Canyon-Steelhead Falls Wilderness Study Area in the State of Oregon to facilitate fire prevention and response activities in order to protect adjacent private property, and for other purposes.
Crooked River Ranch Fire Protection Act

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Natural Resources.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Federal Lands.
Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.

calendar.text: Ordered to be Reported (Amended) by the Yeas and Nays: 20 - 13.

action.text: Reported (Amended) by the Committee on Natural Resources. H. Rept. 115-281.

calendar.text: Placed on the Union Calendar, Calendar No. 201.

term.name: Wilderness and natural areas, wildlife refuges, wild rivers, habitats

bill.summary:
Crooked River Ranch Fire Protection Act
This bill requires the Department of the Interior to adjust the eastern boundary of the Deschutes Canyon-Steelhead Falls Wilderness Study Area in Oregon to exclude approximately 832 acres, as depicted on the map entitled " "Deschutes Canyon-Steelhead Falls Wilderness Study Area" dated April 6, 2017, to facilitate fire prevention and response activities on the excluded public lands and adjacent private property.
